<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105441</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105441</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973966</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Kagaku</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kagaku</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Kagaku</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Kagaku</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Kagaku</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Kagaku</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Kagaku</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">�Kagaku" (Japanese for Chemistry) is a simple Periodic Table of Elements. It displays the PTE on a scrollable screen. Tap on an element to view details or pick an element from a list.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">das?Kagaku "(japanisch für Chemie) ist eine 
einfache periodische Tabelle der Elemente. Es zeigt das PTE auf 
einem scrollable Bildschirm an. Klopfen Sie auf einem Element, 
um Details anzusehen oder ein Element von einer Liste auszuwählen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le ?Kagaku "(japonais pour la chimie) est un 
Tableau périodique simple des éléments. Il affiche le PTE sur
un écran scrollable. Tapez sur un élément pour visualiser des
détails ou pour sélectionner un élément d'une liste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o?Kagaku "(japonês para o chemistry) é uma 
tabela periódica simples dos elementos. Indica o PTE em uma 
tela scrollable. Bata em um elemento para ver detalhes ou 
escolher um elemento de uma lista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il?Kagaku "(giapponese per chimica) è una Tabella
periodica semplice degli elementi. Visualizza il PTE su uno 
schermo scrollable. Colpisca su un elemento per osservare i 
particolari o selezionare un elemento da una lista.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">?Kagaku "(ιαπωνικά για τη χημεία) είναι ένας 
απλός περιοδικός πίνακας των στοιχείων. Παρουσιάζει pte 
σε μια scrollable οθόνη. Η βρύση σε ένα στοιχείο στις 
λεπτομέρειες όψης ή επιλέγει ένα στοιχείο από έναν κατάλογο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el?Kagaku "(japonés para la química) es un 
vector periódico simple de elementos. Visualiza el PTE en una 
pantalla scrollable. Golpee ligeramente en un elemento para 
visión los detalles o para escoger un elemento de una lista.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973966</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105441</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/kagaku</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
